organic.title: Vega Sicilia Unico 2012 - Wine-Searcher
organic.snippet: Vega Sicilia Unico 2012. Spain Castilla y Leon Ribera del Duero. 99 points. The iconic Spanish wine.

organic.title: Vega Sicilia Unico 2012 | Decanter Rating
organic.snippet: 98 points. One of Spain's greatest wines. Tempranillo-based blend from Ribera del Duero.

organic.title: Vega Sicilia Unico 2012 | Vivino
organic.snippet: Rated 4.8 out of 5. Spain's most legendary wine. Rich and complex.
